pre_caption: This is a wide, high-angle shot of an abstract, animated scene. Initially, two tall figures stand in silhouette in the foreground on the center-right, positioned on a cloud-like platform that occupies the bottom of the frame. In the background, a luminous, canyon-like area is centered, containing a multitude of smaller figures that recede into the distance. The scene is framed by dark, cavernous shapes on the top, left, and right. As the shot progresses, the camera slowly moves to the right, causing the two foreground figures to shift from their center-right position toward the right edge of the frame, while the central chasm in the background shifts toward the left.
